snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [264] Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

This game is released in USA and Europe for the NES as River City Ransom. It is the sequel of Renegade, the game that have been released for most of the computers and consoles by the end of the '80s. Too bad this version is not in english. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
